类的使用
net.minecraft.world.DifficultyInstance

  • 使用DifficultyInstance的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    net.minecraft.entity  
    net.minecraft.entity.monster  
    net.minecraft.entity.passive  
    net.minecraft.world  

    • net.minecraft.entity中DifficultyInstance的使用

      参数类型为DifficultyInstance的net.minecraft.entity中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      IEntityLivingData EntityLiving.onInitialSpawn​(DifficultyInstance difficulty, IEntityLivingData livingdata)
      Called only once on an entity when first time spawned, via egg, mob spawner, natural spawning etc, but not called when entity is reloaded from nbt.
      protected void EntityLiving.setEnchantmentBasedOnDifficulty​(DifficultyInstance difficulty)
      Enchants Entity's current equipments based on given DifficultyInstance
      protected void EntityLiving.setEquipmentBasedOnDifficulty​(DifficultyInstance difficulty)
      Gives armor or weapon for entity based on given DifficultyInstance
